CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 29, 1955, pg. 3, reads: "New Hill City Officials - At the regular election of Hill City officials on Saturday, Jan. 15, the following officers were elected.  Seated, left to right: Marjorie Harris, council member; George Tilley, mayor, and Barbara Harris, city solicitor.  Standing: Harry Parker, city controller; Alfred Harris, district attorney; Anderson Little, constable; Jerome Jackson and Otis Edwards, alderman, and Richard Reed, councilman.  Not pictured are Judges Romaine Parham and Earlese Brown, and council members Francis Peterson, Audrey Dixon, Lois Squire, Doris Woodson and Henry Rogers. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Newly elected Hill City officials, seated from left: Marjorie Harris, George Tilley, Barbara Harris; standing: Harry Parker, Alfred Harris, Anderson Little, Jerome Jackson, Otis Edwards, and Richard Reed
